name: whinge
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to complain, especially about something that does not seem important: Oh stop whinging, for heaven's sake! She's always whingeing (on) about something.
More examplesFewer examplesShe had nothing to whinge about.You whine and whinge and think of no one but yourself.I am not going to whinge that the weather in Scotland is always colder than in England.

the act of complaining, especially about something that does not seem important: We were just having a whinge about our boss - nothing new. This is not a whinge - just a statement of fact.
More examplesFewer examplesI'm just having a little whinge, that's all.Usually her demands began with a whinge about us spending more time together.I don't want this to turn into a whinge session.
